value.title: SoftBank's Son is seeking about USD 100 billion for AI chip venture, Bloomberg reports

value.title: What Using Security to Regulate AI Chips Could Look Like
value.excerpt: An exploratory research proposal is recommending regulation of AI chips and stronger governance measures to keep up with the rapid technical innovations in artificial intelligence.

value.title: Supermicro: Cooling The AI Boom
value.excerpt: Supermicro’s stock has gone off the handle because anyone planning to run AI needs the sort of systems it produces to cool their country’s worth of electric space heaters down.

value.title: Chipping In: Billionaire-Founded Unicorn Startup Makes Semiconductor ‘Chiplets’ For The AI Boom
value.excerpt: Singapore-based Silicon Box specializes in chiplets, an increasingly popular way of making high-performing chips. To help ramp up production, the startup recently raised $200 million in a Series B round.

value.title: At the Speed of Light: Unveiling the Chip That’s Reimagining AI Processing

value.title: Best AI gaming laptops
value.excerpt: The ROG Zephyrus G14 is a compact powerhouse. There's no other words to describe it really. It comes with a top-of-the-line Ryzen AI powered AMD Ryzen 9 7940HS processor which is paired with an NVIDA RTX 4080 Laptop GPU.

value.title: SK-backed Sapeon to develop on-device AI chip
value.excerpt: Sapeon, a fabless startup backed by South Korean telecom-to-chip conglomerate SK Group, said Friday it would develop a new semiconductor optimized for on-device artificial intelligence as the market has been witnessing significant growth in recent years.

value.title: ‘Game on’ for video AI as Runway, Stability react to OpenAI’s Sora leap
value.excerpt: Runway CEO Cristóbal Valenzuela posted two words on X in response to today's demo drop of OpenAI's Sora video AI model: 'game on.'

value.title: AI computing firm Lambda raises $320 million in fresh funding
value.excerpt: Lambda: "This AI rollout is going to require a lot of Graphics Processing Unit (GPUs). This latest financing supports our mission to make GPU compute as ubiquitous as electricity," said CEO and Co-founder Stephen Balaban.

value.title: SK Hynix reportedly plans AI chip alliance with TSMC
value.excerpt: SK Hynix is rumored to be establishing an Artificial Intelligence (AI) semiconductor alliance with TSMC, investing in the development of next-generation high-bandwidth memory (HBM) such as HBM4, and strengthening its packaging technology capabilities to solidify its respective positions in the AI semiconductor market,

value.title: Nvidia’s “Chat With RTX” is a ChatGPT-style app that runs on your own GPU
value.excerpt: On Tuesday, Nvidia released Chat With RTX, a free personalized AI chatbot similar to ChatGPT that can run locally on a PC with an Nvidia RTX graphics card. It uses Mistral or Llama open-weights LLMs and can search through local files and answer questions about them.

value.title: Startups pursue GPU alternatives for AI

In its most recent quarter, Nvidia posted record-high data center revenue of $14.5 billion, which is up 41% from the prior quarter and 279% from the year-ago quarter. Its GPUs are now the standard in AI processing, even more so than they are in gaming.
